{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EVR100 |revision= |upc=230494858454 |ean= |asin=B004YD7BII |price= |est_release_date=04/28/2011 |fcc_date=07/28/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR9850 |ic_id=3616C-SR985010 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640ETTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} ''Wireless VPN Gigabit Router''
[http://www.engeniustech.com/index.php/home-networking/routers/9329-evr100-wireless-n-security-vpn-router-with-gigabit-switch Product page]
[http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/EVR100%20User%20Manual.pdf Manual] [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/engenius-senao-evr100-wireless-n-security-vpn-router-2001 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] "7016A0305014 Ver: 1.10" is silkscreened on the board of the unit populating this entry. :This particular board is using '''JACKCON''' capacitors. The power adapter included with the device may be a '''DVE''' DSA-12G-12 FUS 120120 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A).
